parameters.name: PersistId
parameters.description: Persistent reference IDs returned by IModelDocExtension::GetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference or IModelDocExtension::IGetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference

title: IModelDocExtension.GetSheetMetalObjectsByPersistReference
description: Gets the objects in a folded sheet metal part that correspond to the byte array of persistent reference IDs of an entity in a flattened sheet metal part.
signature:
System.Object GetSheetMetalObjectsByPersistReference( 
   System.Object
PersistId
,
   out System.Int32
ErrorCode
)

parameters.name: PersistId
parameters.description: Persistent reference IDs returned by IModelDocExtension::GetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference or IModelDocExtension::IGetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference

returns: Objects in a folded sheet metal part that correspond to the byte array of persistent reference IDs of an entity in a flattened sheet metal part
remarks:
See
Persistent Reference IDs
for more information.
